org.json

Class Json4Uws

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.Json4Uws

  • public final class Json4Uws
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful conversion functions from UWS to JSON.
    Version:
    4.1 (12/2014)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (CDS;ARI)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getJson

        public static final JSONObject getJson(UWS uws)
                                throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the given UWS.
        Parameters:
        uws - The UWS to represent in JSON.
        Returns:
        Its JSON representation.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.

      • getJson

        public static final JSONObject getJson(JobList jobsList,
                 JobOwner owner)
                                throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the given jobs list.
        Parameters:
        jobsList - The jobs list to represent in JSON.
        owner - The user who asks to serialize the given jobs list. (MAY BE NULL)
        Returns:
        Its JSON representation.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.

      • getJson

        public static final JSONObject getJson(UWSJob job)
                                throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the given job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job to represent in JSON.
        Returns:
        Its JSON representation.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.

      • getJson

        public static final JSONObject getJson(UWSJob job,
                 UWSUrl jobsListUrl,
                 boolean reference)
                                throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the given job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job to represent in JSON.
        jobsListUrl - The URL of its jobs list. (MAY BE NULL)
        reference - true if only a reference to the given job must be returned rather than its full description, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        Its JSON representation.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.

      • getJobParamsJson

        public static final JSONObject getJobParamsJson(UWSJob job)
                                         throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the parameters of the given job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job whose the parameters must be represented in JSON.
        Returns:
        The JSON representation of its parameters.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.

      • getJobResultsJson

        public static final JSONArray getJobResultsJson(UWSJob job)
                                         throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the results of the given job.
        Parameters:
        job - The job whose the results must be represented in JSON.
        Returns:
        The JSON representation of its results.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON array.

        Returns:

      • getJson

        public static final JSONObject getJson(java.lang.String key,
                 long value)
                                throws JSONException
        Gets the JSON representation of the given pair key/value.
        Parameters:
        key - The value name.
        value - The value of type long corresponding to the given key/name.
        Returns:
        Its JSON representation.
        Throws:
        JSONException - If there is an error while building the JSON object.
